properties.Content:
Devastated by the wildfires in Sonoma County. Lost so much, but grateful for the community's support.
Please stay safe everyone. Evacuate when told and check on your neighbors.üôè
properties.Name: Twee 1 #Wildfire2023

properties.Content:
Huge shoutout to the firefighters and first responders in Sonoma County.
Your bravery and dedication saved so many lives and homes.
Eternally grateful. ‚ù§Ô∏èüöí
properties.Name: Twee 2 #Sonoma

properties.Content:
Walking through the ashes of my childhood home, memories burning brighter than ever.
Heartbroken, but we'll rebuild. Sonoma has been through tough times before. We rise together.
properties.Name: Twee 3 #SonomaResilience
